entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
